title: Unreal Gold (Raw Disk Image) [ISO]
description:
UNREAL GOLD .ISO

This file is the Unreal Gold .iso directly ripped from a personal copy of the original game disk.
Simply mount this file using MagicISO, PowerISO, Daemon Tools, or any other ISO mounting tools, and use the installer.

NO CRACKS OR ANY OTHER ALTERED FILES ARE REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME. SIMPLY USE THE ORIGINAL SETUP.EXE. INSTALL, AND PLAY.

It is HIGHLY recommended to visit: www.oldunreal.com for continuing community updates and mods/mutators/maps/etc for the original Unreal.

For current patches, visit http://www.oldunreal.com/oldunrealpatches.html
For the most current patch as of 12/01/2013, http://www.unrealtexture.com/Unreal/Downloads/Patches/227Patch/UnrealClassicPatch227i.zip

These patches fix a variety of issues with the original game and generally improve gameplay.

Websites of interest:
oldunreal.com -The best site for all things Unreal.
Unrealsp.org -An ongoing community for all things singleplayer in Unreal.
moddb.com/games/unreal -Many great mods in one place.
uttexture.com -All things pertaining to re-texturing of Unreal and Unreal Tournament.
newbiesplayground.com -Probably the largest continuing clan for Unreal, containing innumerable helpful hints and tricks, links, and downloads.
